with all of its splendid second life type perverts, its vaporwave aesthetics, shifting architecture and
landscapes, the posts and the vibes. But before they did that, they visited the Mad Suckler with
John Carlo the Bullfrog in tow. They sucked on some fingers and they made a deal. Take care of
Jeff Tiedrich, the king of posts in The Matrix 2, and then they can use his The Matrix 2
ports whenever they want.
The detectives agreed, and after belittling a pig, they strapped in, sucked on a binky,
and became the selves they always dreamed of being.
Ray William Johnson became Jack Black.
Blotas Pits, whoops, Blotas Pits became Caleb Pits.
And Patrick Yoder became Caleb Pits 2.
Upon entering, they received a call from Mommy Goodlegs, telling them to go track down freaking
Carol Baskin, an associate of hers, and a message from an unknown sender saying "he knows."
They went into Dematrix 2, sponsored by Teen Vogue, and began to make some noise.
They went into Jeff's pagoda on top of Mount Paul and embarrassed him with sly trickery,
disguises, and good old-fashioned posting your dick and balls on the internet.
Sufficiently beaten down, physically, emotionally, and financially, after his entire V pagoda
